TC_4.1.description: Validate that user successfully provide user information for checkout and continue successfully
TC_4.1.author: Anoja

TC_4.2.description: Validate that user successfully cancel order checkout by not providing user info and click on cancel button
TC_4.2.author: Anoja

TC_4.3.description: Validate that user successfully cancel order checkout by providing user info and click on cancel button
TC_4.3.author: Anoja

TC_4.4.description: Validate that user cancel error message and provide correct user info and continue to checkout successfully
TC_4.4.author: Anoja
